channel.title: CVE Feed for TeamViewer -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TeamViewer -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-0837|2024-08-02T05:24:34.286Z -- teamviewer -- remote
item.description: An improper authorization check of local device settings in TeamViewer Remote between version 15.41 and 15.42.7 for Windows and macOS allows an unprivileged user to change basic local device settings even though the options were locked. This can result in unwanted changes to the configuration.

item.title: CVE-2024-2451|2024-08-01T19:11:53.533Z -- teamviewer -- remote%20%28full%20client%29
item.description: Improper fingerprint validation in the TeamViewer Client (Full & Host) prior Version 15.54 for Windows and macOS allows an attacker with administrative user rights to further elevate privileges via executable sideloading.

item.title: CVE-2024-2451|2024-07-24T17:59:43.200Z -- teamviewer -- remote%20%28full%20client%29
item.description: Improper fingerprint validation in the TeamViewer Client (Full & Host) prior Version 15.54 for Windows and macOS allows an attacker with administrative user rights to further elevate privileges via executable sideloading.

item.title: CVE-2024-2451|2024-05-28T14:27:25.918Z -- teamviewer -- remote%20%28full%20client%29
item.description: Improper fingerprint validation in the TeamViewer Client (Full & Host) prior Version 15.54 for Windows and macOS allows an attacker with administrative user rights to further elevate privileges via executable sideloading.

item.title: CVE-2024-0819|2024-02-27T14:07:24.294Z -- teamviewer -- remote%20full%20client
item.description: Improper initialization of default settings in TeamViewer Remote Client prior version 15.51.5 for Windows, Linux and macOS, allow a low privileged user to elevate privileges by changing the personal password setting and establishing a remote connection to a logged-in admin account.

item.title: CVE-2024-1933|2024-03-26T12:47:11.238Z -- teamviewer -- remote%20client
item.description: Insecure UNIX Symbolic Link (Symlink) Following in TeamViewer Remote Client prior Version 15.52 for macOS allows an attacker with unprivileged access, to potentially elevate privileges or conduct a denial-of-service-attack by overwriting the symlink.

item.title: CVE-2024-1933|2024-08-01T18:56:22.309Z -- teamviewer -- remote%20client
item.description: Insecure UNIX Symbolic Link (Symlink) Following in TeamViewer Remote Client prior Version 15.52 for macOS allows an attacker with unprivileged access, to potentially elevate privileges or conduct a denial-of-service-attack by overwriting the symlink.

item.title: CVE-2024-0819|2024-08-01T18:18:18.662Z -- teamviewer -- remote%20full%20client
item.description: Improper initialization of default settings in TeamViewer Remote Client prior version 15.51.5 for Windows, Linux and macOS, allow a low privileged user to elevate privileges by changing the personal password setting and establishing a remote connection to a logged-in admin account.
